actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for payment under the medicare program for more frequent hemodialysis treatments.
short_title: Kidney Patient Daily Dialysis Quality Act of 2001
subjects: Department of Health and Human Services

summary.text: Kidney Patient Daily Dialysis Quality Act of 2001 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act (SSA) to direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services to publish final regulations for equivalent per treatment prospective payment rates for more frequent hemodialysis treatments furnished to qualified individuals at home and in a facility (composite Method I and Method II Cap rates), and prospective payment rates for in-facility training for more frequent hemodialysis.

titles.title: Kidney Patient Daily Dialysis Quality Act of 2001
A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for payment under the medicare program for more frequent hemodialysis treatments.
